Title: Binding from Collection of Poems (divan)
Dimensions: Folio H: 8 11/16 x W: 5 1/8 in. (22 x 13 cm)
Description: The binding from Walters manuscript W.631 is composed of dark brown leather (with a flap). The binding is decorated with a gold-brushed central panel and frames panel-stamped in relief; a central panel with lobed medallion and pendants, and an allover floral and vine decoration.
Keywords: Islamic; Persian; Safavid; Book; Calligraphy; Codex; Colophon; Illumination; Illustration; Manuscript; Miniature; Painting; Contemporary Binding; Iran; Fortune-telling; Literature -- Poetry
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Iranian
